summary.para: Sets the characteristics of a drag-and-drop operation over an object.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: The flags that determine the characteristics of a drag-and-drop operation over an object.

Allow text specified in to be displayed on the drag image. If you pass this flag into the dwFlags parameter of IDragSourceHelper2.SetFlags, then the text description is rendered on top of the supplied drag image. If you pass a drag image into an object, then by default, the extra text description of the drag-and-drop operation is not displayed.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
